players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that we've already had a death so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure no one else gets hurt."
You: "I agree with Diana. We need to be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words. Let's work together as a team to ensure everyone's safety."
Charlie: "Let's stick together and watch each other closely. We need to prevent any more deaths."
You: "Let's continue to work together and keep a close eye on each other. We don't want any more deaths in this game. Charlie, I'm still suspicious of your actions during the night."
Charlie: "Let's all stay united and keep an eye on each other. I assure you that my actions were necessary for the game's progression."

Diana: "I believe we should focus on building trust and cooperation among us as a team. Let's continue to keep an open mind and communicate effectively with each other. We can't let suspicion and fear divide us."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
